name: Circular Bandaging
warning: For bleeding wounds on limbs. Apply direct pressure first.

steps.title: Control Bleeding First
steps.voice_prompt: First, apply direct pressure to the wound for at least 5 minutes.

steps.title: Clean Wound
steps.voice_prompt: Gently rinse the wound with clean water and pat dry.

steps.title: Position Roller Bandage
detailed_instructions: Hold bandage roll in dominant hand
steps.voice_prompt: Position the bandage below the wound and make two anchor wraps.

steps.title: Spiral Wrap
detailed_instructions: Each wrap overlaps previous by half
steps.voice_prompt: Wrap upward in spirals, overlapping each wrap by half. Keep even pressure.

steps.title: Secure Bandage
steps.description: Finish with anchor wraps and secure
detailed_instructions: Do not use pins on circular bandages
steps.voice_prompt: Make two final wraps and secure with tape or clips.

steps.title: Check Circulation
steps.voice_prompt: Check circulation beyond the bandage. Loosen if too tight and seek medical care.
